ARABIC: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ إِن تَكْفُرُوٓا۟ أَنتُمْ وَمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِىٌّ حَمِيدٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Musa said, 'If you were to be ungrateful, you and everyone on the earth, Allah is Rich Beyond Need, Praiseworthy.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And Moses said: "What if you and all the people of the world deny, God is unconcerned and worthy of praise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Moses said: "Were you to disbelieve - you and all those who live on earth - Allah is still Self-Sufficient, Innately Praiseworthy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Moses told his people, "If you and everyone on the earth turn to disbelief, know that God is Self-sufficient and Praiseworthy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Moosa said, “If you and all who are in the earth turn disbelievers, then indeed Allah is definitely Independent (Unwanting), Most Praiseworthy.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Musa said: "If you disbelieve, you and all on earth together, then verily, Allah is Rich (free of all needs), Worthy of all praise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Musa said: If you are ungrateful, you and those on earth all together, most surely Allah is Self-sufficient, Praised;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And Moses said, 'If you are thankless, you and whoso is on earth, all together, yet assuredly God is All-sufficient, All-laudable.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Moses said: Though ye and all who are in the earth prove thankless, lo! Allah verily is Absolute, Owner of Praise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Moses said, "Even if you should deny the truth, and all who dwell on earth together, God is self-sufficient, praiseworthy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Musa said: if ye disbelive, -- ye and all those who are on the earth-then verily Allah is self-sufficient, Praiseworthy. disquieting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And Moses said, ‘Should you be faithless,—you and everyone on the earth, all together—indeed Allah is all-sufficient, all-laudable.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Moses said: "If ye show ingratitude, ye and all on earth together, yet is Allah free of all wants, worthy of all praise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Musa (Moses) said: "If you disbelieve, you and all on earth together, then verily! Allah is Rich (Free of all wants), Owner of all Praise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And Moses said: 'If you and all mankind are thankless, He is surely Rich, Praised'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Moses said, “Even if you are ungrateful, together with everyone on earth—God is in no need, Worthy of Praise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Moses said, "If you should disbelieve, you and whoever is on the earth entirely - indeed, Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [14:8] And Moses said, to his people: ‘If you are thankless, you and all who are on earth, lo! assuredly God is Independent, [without need] of His creatures, Praised’, praiseworthy in what He does with them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Moses said: Though you and all who are in the earth prove thankless) disbelieve, (lo! Allah verily is Absolute) He is free of need for your faith, (Owner of Praise) in the sight of he who professes His divine Oneness. 265
